TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "book", "quantity": 32, "index": 20}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick_stairs", "quantity": 58, "index": 31}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft diorite_stairs, I need to craft diorite first, and to craft diorite I need to craft quartz. I can craft quartz by smelting the nether quartz ore at slot 21 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 21 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted 1 quartz, but I need to craft 2 more quartz to craft diorite. I can craft quartz by smelting the nether quartz ore at slot 21 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 21 to slot 12 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted 2 quartz, but I need to craft 1 more quartz to craft diorite. I can craft quartz by smelting the nether quartz ore at slot 21 into an empty slot (eg., 13). To craft diorite, I need to place 2 quartz and 1 cobblestone in the crafting grid. I will move the cobblestone at slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
